mapper.select:
select a.code_type_id as codeTypeId, a.code_type_name as codeTypeName, a.sort_no as sortNo, a.remark as remark
from t_sys_code_type a where 1=1
AND a.code_type_id like concat('%',#{entity.codeTypeId},'%')
AND a.code_type_name like concat('%',#{entity.codeTypeName},'%')
order by a.sort_no
